  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),

        function glow(opacity, withfade) {                       
            $('[class*="glowuntil"]').each(function (index) {
                for (var i = 0; i < this.classList.length; i++) {
                    if (this.classList[i].indexOf("glowuntil") > -1) {
                        var now = new Date()
                        var parts = this.classList[i].substr(9, 10).split('-');
                        var until = new Date(parts[0], parts[1] - 1, parts[2]);
                        if (now.getTime() < until.getTime()) {
                            $(this).css("-webkit-box-shadow", "0px 0px 3px 3px rgba(161, 242, 242, " + (opacity).toString() + ")");
                            $(this).css("-moz-box-shadow", "0px 0px 3px 3px rgba(161, 242, 242, " + (opacity).toString() + ")");
                            $(this).css("box-shadow", "0px 0px 3px 3px rgba(161, 242, 242, " + (opacity).toString() + ")");
                        }
                    }
                }
            });

            if (withfade == 1) {
                if (opacity > 0) {
                    setTimeout("glow(" + ((opacity - 0.1).toFixed(1)).toString() + ",1)", 500);
                }
            }
            return false;
        }

Students
Staff





Study with us


Undergraduate
Find your voice. A home for original thinkers, Essex gives you the skills and knowledge to succeed and make a difference.

Undergraduate study



Masters courses
Is there more to be said? Take your knowledge further, gaining the skills demanded by today’s global employers.

Masters courses



PhD research
Let's have an argument. Fuelled by powerful ideas, we have a global reputation for pioneering research which helps change lives.

PhD research



CPD/Short courses
We offer high quality short courses and Continuing Professional Development (CPD) opportunities to develop your key skills.

CPD/Short courses

Life at Essex


Colchester Campus
Everything you need on-site and home to students from 130 countries. It's the world in one place.

Colchester Campus



Southend Campus
Specialist resources and state-of-the-art facilities in the heart of a vibrant and exciting seaside town.

Southend Campus



Loughton Campus
Home to East 15 Acting School, offering a wide range of theatre and dance studios and facilities.

Loughton Campus

International


Why Essex?
Home to students from 130 countries, we're one of the most international universities in the UK.

Why Essex?



Where is Essex?
We're close to London with quick access to major airports and perfectly located for visiting Europe.

Where is Essex?



Courses
Innovative undergraduate and postgraduate courses and support to improve your language and study skills.

Find a course



Fees and funding
Scholarships are available for international students and we give advice on budgeting for life in the UK.

Fees and funding

Research


Research showcase
Our research changes the world, from protecting coral reefs to justice for human rights abuse victims.

Research showcase



Our experts
Our leading academics are available for media interviews and consultancy across our subject range.

Our experts



REF 2014
We're in the UK elite for social sciences, best in Britain for politics and top 20 for research excellence.

REF 2014



TEDx
Our first TEDx event tackled issues from the rise of robot warriors to how we can save the planet.

TEDx



Join us
If you're looking for a vibrant research environment and outstanding postgraduate training, welcome home.

Join us




Business


Knowledge Gateway
The location of choice for knowledge-based science, technology and creative enterprises.

Knowledge Gateway



How can we help?
Our wealth of expertise is driving business forward. Where could consultancy or collaboration take you?

How can we help?



Get funding
We'll help you find the right funding source for your R&D project or student engagement .

Get funding



Conferencing
Our event facilities range from intimate meeting rooms to halls for up to 1,000 people.

Conferencing

Training courses
Engage our students and graduates
Business incubation
Events




News and events


Latest news
Our latest cutting-edge research, commentary on current issues and what's happening at Essex.

Latest news



What's on?
Search the wide range of events happening at our three campuses and get involved.

What's on?



THINK seminars
Join fellow students from all departments and debate key cross-discipline issues that affect everyone.

THINK seminars



Professorial Inaugural Lectures
Presenting research by our new professors.

Professorial Inaugural Lectures



Media enquiries
We'll help you speak to our world-leading academics, find out more about us and organise events.

Media enquiries

Alumni portal
Register or log in and stay connected with us and the friends you made here.

Alumni portal

Come to a reunion, a public lecture or an arts, cultural or sports event.

Events

About us


Getting here
All our campuses have quick road, bus and rail links to London and major airports. We provide Access Guides for our buildings.

Getting here



Our strategy
Find out how we achieve our mission of contributing to society through excellence in education and excellence in research.

Our strategy



Our history
We started small, but with big ambitions. Over five decades we have become one of the UK's leading academic institutions.

Our history

Inside Banksy’s Walled Off Hotel
Dr Gavin Grindon curates new museum at Banksy’s new project in heart of Bethlehem








A month of pushing boundaries
Essex Serpent author Sarah Perry joins our academics and students at Essex Book Festival








We're one of the very best
Student satisfaction, outstanding research and great graduate prospects secure top ranking








Think you know Essex?
Think again. If you want more than just a good degree, think Essex








Postgraduate prospectus 2017-18
Find out why our 3,500 postgraduate students chose Essex with our new prospectus








£10,000 Masters loans available
UK and EU students can apply for postgraduate loans to fund their Masters









WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO STUDY?





[Level]
Undergraduate
Postgraduate taught


Browse by subject area >
All courses >
Postgraduate research finder >




Live in Southend


	Southend Campus accommodation is in a unique and unmissable building. 
	Live in the heart of this seaside town, with modern, state-of-the-art 
	facilities, a buzzing high street and award-winning beaches.


Live in Colchester


	Colchester Campus accommodation options range from the original, iconic 
	towers to newly built residences. Home to over 10,500 students from 130 
	countries, it offers extensive facilities on one compact site.










General enquiries

University of Essex
Wivenhoe Park
Colchester CO4 3SQ
+44 (0) 1206 873333
enquiries@essex.ac.uk

Colchester Campus
Loughton Campus
Southend Campus

			Your Way campus map

Are you a Rising Star?
Rising Stars is Essex’s brand new student development scheme. We're working with top graduate recruiters to help you gain valuable experience and develop employability skills you never knew you could master.
Being a rising star isn't about knowing the right people or being from a privileged background, it’s about unlocking your potential and taking every opportunity to aim high. 
Rising Stars is all about recognising your talent so register your interest if you want to break the mould.



Setting our rents at the right level
Our Director of Campus Services and Estates, Chris Oldham, explains how we set the rents for our accomodation.



myEssexstudent portal



Stay safe
We want to make sure you have a great time at Essex, and that includes keeping you safe. Take a look at the top tips on our safety pages.



Accommodation



Don't get hooked by phishing scams
Take a look at the IT Services blog to see our top tips for spotting a phishing email.



Employability and Careers



Right here, right now
When you study at Essex, you get far more than just a degree. That’s why we’ve launched the Higher Education Achievement Report.



Students’Union




Study skills workshops


Our study skills workshops are open to all students and run throughout the term at our Colchester and Southend campuses. Why not book your place now? 
    


Be heard

Complete the National Student Survey - an independent survey for final year 
	undergraduates. It’s quick to complete and you’ll be helping us improve your student experience.


UROP placements

Our Undergraduate Research Opportunities Programme gives you the chance to help an 
    academic with a research project. We're taking applications now.

homedepartments and schoolsuk data archive


Welcome to the UK Data Archive

UK Data Service

The UK Data Service provides unified access to the UK’s largest collection of social, economic and population data.

We are the lead organisation of the UK Data Service and an internationally acknowledged centre of expertise in 
     acquiring, curating and providing access to data. The Archive has been providing coordinated data service infrastructure to the 
     Economic and Social Research Council for 50 years.
The data collections held by the UK Data Archive reflect the issues that affect all our lives and experiences, both close to home and internationally, 
	covering every continent, from birth through education, employment, our social interaction and on to old age.
The UK Data Archive is also the base for the Administrative Data Research Network (ADRN), which gives trained social 
	and economic researchers secure access to linked, de-identified administrative data.


UK 
		Data Service on Facebook
UK Data 
		Service on Twitter
UK Data 
		Archive on Twitter


Explore our collection:

Search for data
See our key datasets
Find Census data
Deposit your research data
Sign up to our quarterly newsletter
Contact us




News and events

See our latest news and upcoming events. We run regular webinars, workshops and conferences 
    on all aspects of social sciences data use.
 
Teaching with data

Bring real-life data into your coursework. Most of our data can be used to produce recent, engaging, real-world teaching resources. 
    We also have select open-access datasets just for teaching and learning.
 
Data management

Need a data management plan for your own research data? We’re internationally known experts. See our step-by-step guides and 
    training resources for creating, preparing, storing and sharing your data.

Creative writingStudy with usUndergraduate coursesMA coursesPhD studyWatch our videosDrama and theatre studiesStudy with usUndergraduate coursesMA coursesPhD studyWatch our videosEnglish and comparative literatureStudy with usUndergraduate coursesMA coursesPhD studyWatch our videosFilm studiesStudy with usUndergraduate coursesMA coursesPhD studyWatch our videosJournalismStudy with usUndergraduate coursesCareers and skillsYour career optionsStudy abroadInternshipsGraduate profilesFees and scholarshipsOverviewHow to applyApply to study at EssexResearchOur researchPublicationsResearch Group in Ecocriticism, Green Writing and Literary GeographiesCurrent PhD thesesMemory MapsStaffAcademic staffAdministrative staffGraduate Teaching Assistants and other research studentsAbout usOur DepartmentNews, events and seminarsNewsSeminarsAmerican NetworksFilm screeningsFor current studentsMoodleResourcesIndependent Research ProjectStudent representativesContact usContact detailsAsk us a question



homeliterature, film, and theatre studies


Welcome

Research excellence

Three-quarters of our research is rated 'world leading' or 'internationally excellent' (REF 2014). We do both creative 
and critical work across genres and media forms using a distinctly comparative approach.

We are an interdisciplinary department with expertise in English literature, 
              drama, creative writing, journalism, 
             film and screen media. Our courses are taught by leading academics, writers, 
             film makers and journalists, and allow you to follow specialised pathways or to combine your 
             interests across our subject areas.
We have an international reputation for the quality of our research and teaching, with excellent scores for student satisfaction and graduate prospects.


Literature, Film and Theatre Studies on Facebook
Literature, Film and Theatre Studies on Twitter
Literature, Film and Theatre Studies on WordPress


Our strengths


		6th for drama in the UK (Guardian University Guide 2015)

		Top 20 in the UK for English and creative writing (Guardian University Guide 2015)
Use of our state-of-the-art Lakeside Theatre
Dedicated film screening and editing facilities, and media centre 





Our academic staff

Our academic staff are internationally recognised for their expertise across literature, film, creative writing and drama. Find out more by reading their staff profiles.
 
News and events

Check out our news and events section for the latest information about publications, research excellence, awards and achievements by our staff and students.
 

Research Seminars

Throughout the year our weekly Research Seminar series welcomes leading academic specialists, as well as writers, poets, playwrights, filmmakers and journalists to talk about their work.

homelaw


Exploring justice, promoting human rights

Tweets by @EssexLawSchool
!function(d,s,id){var js,fjs=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],p=/^http:/.test(d.location)?'http':'https';if
(!d.getElementById(id)){js=d.createElement(s);js.id=id;js.src=p+"://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js,fjs);}}(document,"script","twitter-wjs");


We are freer, more daring and more experimental than many traditional law schools. Our approach is global in outlook, 
		based on justice, and reflects our commitment to providing a legal education and carrying out research that is relevant and responsive to the demands 
		of a changing society.
Our undergraduate and postgraduate courses combine rigorous 
		legal training with opportunities to develop practical expertise. This prepares you to become an outstanding legal 
		professional and gives you the skills and knowledge to be an agent for change, whatever your ambitions.


Like us on Facebook
Follow us on Twitter
Watch our videos on Vimeo


Why law at Essex?

Gain practical experience with our Essex Law Clinic and Human Rights Clinic
Work placement, internship and study abroad 
	opportunities during your course
Peer mentors guide you through your first year
Leading research expertise across commercial law, public law, and human rights law




Undergraduate study

Gain academic and practical expertise with our undergraduate courses. 
Understand and challenge what law and justice mean in the UK and beyond, and be prepared for a legal career in a globalised world.
 
Research-led education

Our world-leading research tackles the most important and urgent issues affecting national 
and international law. It's at the centre of the undergraduate and postgraduate legal education we offer.
 
Human Rights Centre

Our Human Rights Centre is a global leader in human rights research, practice and education. 
The Centre was awarded the Queen’s Anniversary Prize in 2010 in recognition of its work.

        function glow(opacity, withfade) {                       
            $('[class*="glowuntil"]').each(function (index) {
                for (var i = 0; i < this.classList.length; i++) {
                    if (this.classList[i].indexOf("glowuntil") > -1) {
                        var now = new Date()
                        var parts = this.classList[i].substr(9, 10).split('-');
                        var until = new Date(parts[0], parts[1] - 1, parts[2]);
                        if (now.getTime() < until.getTime()) {
                            $(this).css("-webkit-box-shadow", "0px 0px 3px 3px rgba(161, 242, 242, " + (opacity).toString() + ")");
                            $(this).css("-moz-box-shadow", "0px 0px 3px 3px rgba(161, 242, 242, " + (opacity).toString() + ")");
                            $(this).css("box-shadow", "0px 0px 3px 3px rgba(161, 242, 242, " + (opacity).toString() + ")");
                        }
                    }
                }
            });

            if (withfade == 1) {
                if (opacity > 0) {
                    setTimeout("glow(" + ((opacity - 0.1).toFixed(1)).toString() + ",1)", 500);
                }
            }
            return false;
        }

Introduction

Centres and surveys

We are home to three outstanding research centres: the ESRC UK Longitudinal Studies Centre,
	the ESRC Centre on Micro-social Change and EUROMOD.
	We have run the British Household Panel Survey since 1991 and more recently Understanding Society, both world-class resources for social researchers around the globe.

Welcome to the Institute 
			 for Social and Economic Research (ISER). Find out more about 
			 our 
			 postgraduate study opportunities, the surveys we design and run 
			 including 
			 Understanding Society - a study of 100,000 people in 40,000 UK 
			 households, and our exciting programme of interdisciplinary research.
Our research at ISER makes a major contribution to the 
			 University of Essexâs top research ranking and our work helps make 
			 Essex the top destination in the UK for social science. We also 
			 work closely with leading academics from around the world as well 
			 as Government departments, private companies and third sector 
			 organisations.

News and events

Keep up to date with our news, 
    latest study and funding opportunities.
	You can also download any of our working papers and published research free
	of charge.
 
Postgraduate study

Study for a Masters or a PhD with 
	teaching and supervision from our team of world class researchers 
	. ISER is part of the University of Essex Doctoral Training Centre which provides fully-funded study programmes.
 
Understanding Society

Understanding Society is a household survey of 40,000 UK households. This fantastic social science resource 
	interviews 100,000 people annually and is designed and run by our world-class team of survey experts at ISER.
